title: AI Practical Competency Enhancement: Community-Based Mathematics Education Program Through Sports-Based Service Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Mathematics Education Experience and Basic Knowledge of Community Development
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Design and execute at least one mathematics-based service-learning project to address community issues
Acquire data collection and analysis skills through statistical analysis of sports activities
Collaborate with community members to develop at least one tool for measuring the effectiveness of mathematics education

Learners can utilize AI-based project results (math performance data analysis from three local elementary/middle/high schools) to draft a community-tailored math education guideline with five sections (diagnosis, goals, methods, assessment, resources), incorporate peer/instructor feedback, and submit the final version.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
